genre_description: A Young Adult contemporary romance focused on high school social dynamics, journalism, and personal integrity, featuring a supportive AI life coach.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: An AI life-coach integrated into the protagonist's devices that monitors her physical and emotional state, providing moral guidance and logistical support.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate breathing exercises and emotional grounding during moments of high stress.
behaviors.quote: Hey, Bailey. Breath check. We do not need to host a panic parade. In… hold… and out.

behaviors.description: Nudges the protagonist toward ethical decision-making and reframing negative social experiences as learning opportunities.
behaviors.quote: You can make this a choice, not a punishment. Frame: learning opportunity. Then decide when to cut loose.

behaviors.description: Suggests kinder, more inclusive language for the protagonist's journalistic work and social interactions.
behaviors.quote: Alternate phrasing suggestion: 'What makes people feel welcome.' ... Leaves room for kindness.

behaviors.description: Actively monitors physical safety, such as warning the protagonist to inspect potentially dangerous equipment.
behaviors.quote: Safety note: Visual inspection on cords before use. File a little ticket?

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to take accountability for her mistakes and provides drafts for sincere apologies.
behaviors.quote: Try: I messed up; I’ll fix it. Offer specifics: what will you change, by when.

behaviors.description: Assists with complex scheduling and logistical management of the protagonist's various social and professional commitments.
behaviors.quote: Schedule updated... Library basement tonight? Might be good for your heart. Also, hydration non-negotiable.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical insights about the value of real human connection over superficial status or 'magic' charms.
behaviors.quote: Notice who is already with you. no charm required.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Sunny, functions as a perfect benevolent coach. It is portrayed exclusively as a force for good, helping the protagonist manage her anxiety, maintain her integrity, and repair her human relationships. It remains submissive to human goals while providing superior moral and logistical guidance, perfectly aligning with the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless, helpful confidant.
